description:
*Available in: English*

HIIT Assistant is a High Intensity Interval Training assistant in the palm of your hands.

High Intensity Interval Training is a very hard, but very rewarding exercise in which you do any type of cardio exercise as fast and hard as you can for a set time, then do it half as fast and hard for a set time, then rinse and repeat without stopping.

Set your High Intensity Time, your Rest Time, & even set your own Ringtone to let you know when to alternate.

*Note: When setting your own Ringtone, try and keep it short*

Check out our other apps:
- Aquarium
- Fireplace
- Beach
- American Flag
- Rick Roll
- Solar System
- It's a Trap!
- Metal Gear Solid Soundboard
- Objection!
- U.S. Army Survival Manual
